src:
Greg Smith ny vd för Endomines
Endomines har utnämnt Greg Smith till vd, efter att i somras meddelat att bolaget utvärderat just den möjligheten. Greg Smith har på konsultbasis lett Endomines verksamhet i USA och Finland sedan den 5 juni.
06 Nov 2019, 14:06 by Nyhetsbyrån Direkt

text:
Greg Smith new CEO of Endomines
Endomines has appointed Greg Smith as CEO, after this summer's announcement that the company was evaluating that particular opportunity. Greg Smith has been leading Endomine's operations in the US and Finland since June 5 on a consulting basis.
06 Nov 2019, 14:06 by News Agency Direct
